name: Tenkaichi: Sengoku Lovers DS
storyline: The protagonist is a beautiful princess that has lived her whole life wanting for nothing. But one day Oda Nobunaga's army attacks her kingdom and it falls into ruin. She escapes and starts her life on the run along with her childhood friend and meets many famous figures of the Sengoku Period.
summary: A port of Tenkaichi: Sengoku Lovers for Nintendo DS.
